pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'X12-ARIMA'/'X13-ARIMA-SEATS' and Structure for Batch Processing of Seasonal Adjustment // The 'X13-ARIMA- SEATS' https://www.census.gov/srd/www/x13as/ methodology and software is a widely used software and developed by the US Census Bureau. It can be accessed from 'R' with this package and 'X13-ARIMA-SEATS' binaries are provided by the 'R' package 'x13binary'.
